extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean borrowBook(Member borrower, Book borrowedBook)
      this method takes a book and a member inserts entry in the transactions/borrows table in the database to commit it
      boolean checkIfAlreadyHasACopy(Member borrower, Book borrowedBook)
      this method checks if the member/borrower has already a copy of a given book to make sure that he doesn't take more than one copy (library policy)
      void decrementCopiesOfBook(Book book)
      this method takes a certain book and update its entry by increasing its number of copies after a member borrows a book
      java.util.ArrayList<Book> getAllBooksInLibrary() 
      Book getBookByAuthorAndName(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String author)
      returns back a unique book by the combination of the book's title and author which uniquely identify the book in our database
      java.sql.Date getBookReturnDate(int memberId, int bookId)
      given member id and book id we browse the transactions/borrows table to get a certain entry to check when this member should return this book
      void incrementCopiesOfBook(Book book)
      this method takes a certain book and update its entry by increasing its number of copies after a member returns a book
      boolean registerNewBookInLibrary(Book book)
      takes object Book with all its info and inserts it into our database
      boolean removeBookFromDB(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author)
      this method gets a unique book and it removes it from the db of the library
      void removeBorrowedBookTransaction(int memberId, int bookId)
      this method removes an entry of borrowing a book for given member and book from the db entirely we use it for test issues
      boolean returnBook(Member borrower, Book borrowedBook)
      this method completes the process of a member returning a book to db by deactivating the entry in the table
      java.util.ArrayList<Book> searchForABook(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String category)
      this method search for a book in the db by using one or more of those title author or category and if all are empty values it returns all the book in the db
